definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge
water so clear you can see the bottom

sentences.english: I let her play in the clear,blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 我让她在清澈，蔚蓝的天空玩耍。

sentences.english: Foot of the mountain there is a clear bottoming out of the creek, streams next to the terraces.
sentences.chinese: 山脚下有一条清澈见底的小溪，小溪旁边是梯田。

sentences.english: In a clear stream lies an untouched bright pearl.
sentences.chinese: 一颗纯洁璀璨的明珠就卧在清澈溪底。

sentences.english: Holy stream temple has more than ten outlet through millennium still limpid.
sentences.chinese: 圣泉寺中有十多个出水口，历经千年依然清澈。

sentences.english: The water in this area comes from limestone cliffs and is crystal clear.
sentences.chinese: 那里的水从石灰岩里留出来，特别清澈。

sentences.english: From West Lake in Hangzhou, this tea has a bright color and a pleasant fresh taste.
sentences.chinese: 源自杭州西湖，茶汤明亮清澈，清新爽口。

sentences.english: The once clear mountain stream is now polluted and opaque .
sentences.chinese: 曾经是很清澈的山溪，现在受到污染变得混浊了。

sentences.english: But how could the Danube compare with such limpidity ?
sentences.chinese: 可是多瑙河，哪能有她这般清澈？

sentences.english: This pool, clear to the bottom, is said to be the "Xi Shi River Port".
sentences.chinese: 这水池清澈见底，传说是“西施河埠”。

sentences.english: And make sure the eyes are clear, not cloudy.
sentences.chinese: 保证鱼眼是清澈的，不浑浊。
鸥鸟尖利的歌声那样清澈。

sentences.english: East lake water is clear for swimming.
sentences.chinese: 东湖大湖里的水很清澈比较适合游泳。

sentences.english: They dipped up the clear water.
The water in a clear lake transmits sunlight much better than snow.
sentences.chinese: 清澈湖中的水传播阳光要比雪好得多。

sentences.english: A stream of clear brook opened another realm.
sentences.chinese: 一涧清澈的小溪开辟的另一番境界里。

definition: water so clear you can see the bottom
variant of 透徹|透彻[tou4 che4]
pure and limpid/(of a person) quick-witted
